| History                 = The Urban Alliance was a paramilitary cartel established by [[Calvin Zabo (Earth-616)|Mister Hyde]], who hired mercenaries. He had aspirations of becoming the crime kingpin of [[Los Angeles]], having relocated to the city because their were too many super-powered criminals and heroes in [[New York City]]. The cartel vied for power and territory in Los Angeles, starting with East L.A. To serve as their foot soldiers they established the [[Blue Krüe (Earth-616)|Blue Krüe]] street gang. The cartel was taken down by the [[Roberto Reyes (Earth-616)|Ghost Rider]].{{r|All-New Ghost Rider Vol 1 1|10}}
